tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Jaykumar is very caring and helpful doctor. Mine was a case of broken front tooth where other doctors suggested for tooth removal but I took second opinion from Doctor Jaykumar, who saved my front tooth through root canal treatment.Highly meticulous and great quality of work. Very reassuring by giving clear and detailed explaination.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Crowns and Bridges Fixing,
review:
I'm completely new to Bengaluru and looking to do Dental Surgery (RCT, Tooth Filling) which gave me trouble. I was searching with doubt which doctor will be good like that, accidently I saw Best Smile clinic. 
Really telling from my bottom of the heart, Dr. Jayakumar sir outstanding on the way he treated me, with very humble care.
Those who are getting doubt about price, it is same market price no extra.
For me RCT + Tooth Bridge it happened at the price of 27000.
RCT: 3500
Tooth Bridge: 12000 per set.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I absolutely recommend Dr.Jaykumar. He is very dedicated in his work and does it the best.  I had come to replace my tooth cap as it was feeling very uncomfortable and the tooth cap which was already in place had broken. I decided to visit Dr. Jaykumar,  he did his job very nicely I was totally happy with how he fixed my tooth and in conclusion I would highly recommend Dr. Jaykumar and I was extremely satisfied with his work!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Jay Kumar is a very patient and good dentist. When I first went, I was absolutely terrified but he took care of my tooth infection painlessly and has become my go-to for all my dental issues.

I feel as in safe hand for my Root canal and crowning treatment had painless procedures.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Jaykumar has been the most patient and supportive doctor for my entire family! The calm and composed explanations make his patients very confident and relaxed during/after the procedure. 

One of the best doctors in the locality! Highly recommend him for any dental procedures or consults

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor was very nice to me. He explained me each and every detail before starting the procedure. Treatment also doctor started very fast there was no wait time. Home centre care also doctor explained me in details. Digital scan was done for me and the whole process was so painless and comfortable. Now my teeth cap looks so natural and i feel comfortable with it. somebody with tooth problems can definitely visit Dr. Jaykumar.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: Nice and friendly doctor, explained the problem with patience, wait time is also less, good service oriented mind. I am happy with the treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Doctor was very cool and friendly with us and i would suggest everyone to go and check all your problems.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I was very scared about dental treatment but Jaykumar doctors dealing made me to relax .His treatment is excellent, very reliable, highly recommendable.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am satisfied with the services. The doctor is knowledgeable. He was open to discuss the pros and cons of a procedure and didn't force me for profitable procedure instead helped me to make an informed decision best for me .
